nodes.description: 2003年11月伊斯坦布尔英国领事馆遭汽车炸弹袭击，导致领事Roger Short及2名平民死亡
nodes.support_text: Roger Short, the consul general in Istanbul, was killed in the attack on the Charles Barry-designed Italianate Palace in the heart of Istanbul in November 2003.

nodes.description: al-Qaeda关联组织宣称对袭击负责，但存在其无法获取爆炸物及规避安保的质疑
nodes.support_text: Although an al-Qaeda linked group claimed responsibility for the attack at the time, there have always been questions over its ability to source bomb making materials and evade security controls in a country with a powerful security force.

nodes.description: 军方策划的'Operation Sledgehammer'行动在爆炸案8个月前启动，旨在颠覆政府并引发军事政变
nodes.support_text: Investigators claim the bombings were part of 'Operation Sledgehammer' which had been formulated by senior military figures eight months earlier to destabilise Turkey and trigger a military intervention to overthrow the government.

nodes.description: 35名前军方高层因涉嫌参与该行动被捕，包括原陆军、海军及土耳其第1军指挥官
nodes.support_text: Prosecutors have arrested 35 ex-military figures in recent weeks on suspicion of being part of the plot which is also said to have involved plans to provoke Greece into shooting down a Turkish fighter jet.

nodes.description: DNA检测确认领事馆袭击车辆驾驶者为曾参与犹太教堂袭击的激进分子Feridun Ugurlu
nodes.support_text: DNA tests proved that the driver of the vehicle used to blow up the consulate was Feridun Ugurlu, a militant who had previously been named as an accomplice in the synagogue attacks.

nodes.description: 土耳其政府以参与袭击罪起诉69人，指控其策划领事馆、汇丰银行及犹太教堂连环爆炸
nodes.support_text: Turkey put 69 people on trial after the attacks on charges of carrying out the car bombings.

nodes.description: 埃尔多安政府宣布推动1982年军政府宪法改革，削弱军方对司法系统的控制权
nodes.support_text: Mr Erdogan yesterday announced he was planning to introduce sweeping changes to the military-imposed constitution from 1982.

nodes.description: 英国外交部重申不要求重启2003年袭击调查，认可原调查结论
nodes.support_text: The UK was content with both the conduct and the outcome of the investigation into the 2003 bombing of the British Consulate and HSBC building in Istanbul.

nodes.description: 男子策划与基地组织合作
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：男子策划与基地组织合作
语义描述：希腊击落土耳其战机
语义描述：教士表示报告内容

nodes.description: 报告揭示阴谋者的残暴性
